title: Need advice for first time growing seeds
body: I've been growing plants for a while but they've always been pre-started plants, usually from the local farmer's market. Gosh, do I love going to the farmer's market, always so many fresh items! Last week, I picked up some vegetable and herb seeds because I want to try my hand at growing from seeds. However, I'm pretty nervous and could really use some advice!

title: Oh Em Gee, I LOVE Plants
body: I have been looking for an app like this for years!! Any plant app I have come across is as helpful as a log. I love how this app tells me how much I should water my plants, what kind of light they need. I'm really enjoying the community on here, too!! Y'all are fantastic!
